rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with Bohemian design elements, ensuring privacy and quiet.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with bookshelves, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting. The layout is designed to encourage quiet reading.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A private gymnasium equipped with modern fitness apparatus, designed to offer a balanced and energetic environment. Vastu principles ensure that the space promotes physical strength.
